title: Tranquil Private Sanctuary in the Heart of the Byron Bay Hinterlands
description: Picture yourself relaxing by your own private pool, in a stunning cottage nestled in lush forest greenery. Make this dream a reality with a getaway at Sanctuary in the Pocket, a beautiful collection of modern Balinese-style cottages with a prime location in the Byron Bay Hinterlands. From here, you will be within easy reach of the area’s national parks, farmer’s markets and top local foodie destinations. At the end of the day, come home to your beautiful oasis and unwind in style, while you toast your getaway with your included bottle of red or white wine.
offer_address: 17 Skyline Road, The Pocket 2483, NSW, Australia

title: Tranquil Group Sanctuary in the Heart of Byron Bay's Hinterland
description:
Byron Bay isn’t just a nirvana of picture-perfect coastline: it’s a gateway to a paradise of lush mountainside, forestry and tranquillity. Stay in the Byron Bay hinterland, a mere 30-minute drive from the ocean, at the Balinese-inspired Sanctuary in the Pocket retreat. Escape to Bliss Cottage, where you and three friends can find your Zen among the exotic botanical gardens and delve into the private plunge pool or bubbling spa, before watching the sunset over the mountainscape - with a bottle of red or white wine included in your package.

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: 17 Skyline Road, The Pocket 2483, NSW, Australia

title: Tranquil Sanctuary for Four People in the Heart of Byron Bay's Hinterland
description: Byron Bay isn’t just a nirvana of picture-perfect coastline: it’s a gateway to lush mountainside, forest and tranquillity. Stay in the Byron Bay hinterland, a mere 12-minute drive from the ocean, at the Bali-inspired Sanctuary in the Pocket retreat. Enjoy exclusive use of the Bliss Cottage for up to four people, where you can find your Zen among exotic botanical gardens and delve into the private plunge pool or bubbling spa, before watching the sunset over the mountainscape - with a bottle of red or white wine included in your package.
offer_address: 17 Skyline Road, The Pocket 2483, NSW, Australia

title: Tranquil Bali-Inspired Hinterland Escape near Byron Bay
description:
Treat yourself to a tranquil hinterland escape just outside Byron Bay at the Bali-inspired Sanctuary in the Pocket retreat and surround yourself with five acres of exotic gardens where instant relaxation is ensured from the moment of arrival.

Throughout the sanctuary, Balinese-inspired accents are seamlessly intertwined with modern elements to create a tranquil and calming space that transports you to a place far away from the daily hustle and bustle. Take your pick of just three self-contained properties onsite: The Bunk House, Bliss Cottage and The Retreat. Beyond Sanctuary in the Pocket, you can discover Byron Bay’s bounty of national parks, farmers' markets and trendy foodie destinations, with laidback Mullumbimby a 15-minute drive away and Bryon’s quiet little sibling, Brunswick Heads, just 10 minutes by car.

**Your handpicked inclusions (select packages):**

- Start your escape the right way with a welcome bottle of wine
- Daily breakfast provisions, including locally sourced ingredients, to cook up a morning feast (for stays in The Bunk House only)

**Want to make your stay extra special?** Choose the Bliss Cottage, complete with a private plunge pool and private spa.
offer_address: 17 Skyline Road, The Pocket 2483, NSW, Australia

title: Tranquil Byron Bay Retreat
description: Set amid five acres of pristine hinterland in Byron Bay, just a 40-minute drive from Gold Coast Airport, Sanctuary in the Pocket offers the ultimate return-to-nature escape. Positioned to afford privacy and beautiful vistas, these Balinese-style cottages with private pools are ideal for relaxing. For the explorer, Byron Bay’s national parks, farmers’ markets, Mullumbimby and Brunswick Heads are under a 20-minute drive away.
offer_address: 17 Skyline Road, The Pocket 2483, NSW, Australia

title: Bali-Inspired Retreat in Byron Bay's Hinterland
description: Byron Bay isn’t just a nirvana of picture-perfect coastline: it’s a gateway to a paradise of lush mountainside and tranquillity. Stay in the Byron Bay hinterland, a mere 15-minute drive from the ocean, at the Balinese-inspired Sanctuary in the Pocket retreat. Find your zen among the exotic botanical gardens and relax in your private plunge pool or bubbling spa. Enjoy rural tranquillity yet close proximity to the cafes and restaurants of Brunswick Heads and Mullumbimby, and the spectacular beaches of New Brighton and South Golden. Your cottage is one of just three exclusive properties on a sprawling five acres of botanical gardens.
offer_address: 17 Skyline Road, The Pocket 2483, NSW, Australia
